Body: Is there any one pager which sums up what has happened in the project from November, date of the ANN, till today?

Author: ogrudko
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: We will craft annual report in a couple of days and share it to all our social channels. In two words: 1. Filled our tokensale with SEC. 2. Conducted a token sale. Hit the hardcap for presale, but raised only 2M during main sale (bearish market was at full scale during main phase) 3. Got listed on exchanges (Idex, HitBTC). Having issues with HitBTC right now, so the token is not traded the at the moment. 4. Conducted successful tokensale in partnership with Republic Crypto (hit hardcap of $1M in one day) 5. Launched CoinDNA - our inofmrational portal 6. Launched public Beta of our two major platforms - Coinvest and Coinvest Plus. 7. Opened pre-orders for our hardware wallet, Coinvest Vault 8. Upgraded token protocol twice 9. Heading to the public launch of our exchange, Coinvest Plus. 10. Announced partnership with Celsius Network, Cardinal Peak. 11. A lot of stuff going background, which can't announce yet.

Author: lonesomestranger
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: COINVEST Introducing Coinvest Vault - A premium cryptocurrency hardware wallet to store all of your digital assets  We would like to introduce you to our premium cryptocurrency hardware wallet, the Coinvest Vault. The Coinvest Vault complements the Coinvest products to offer consumers a secure end-to-end solution to invest in digital assets. The Coinvest hardware wallet offers state-of-the art design and architecture featuring:  - A cryptographic coprocessor with secure hardware-based key storage and asymmetric and symmetric cipher support - Linux operating system using a SAMA5D2 pre-PCI certified processor - 3.5” LED backlit full touchscreen display with 320x480 resolution - FIDO/U2F support to use COIN wallet as a security token for two-factor authentication - A single USB-C connection with support for authenticating desktop and mobile devices - A dedicated screen and authentication chip to protect consumers even if the host computer is infected with a virus or malware - Support for multiple token protocols including Bitcoin, Bitcoin Cash, Ethereum, ERC20 tokens, and more  Watch full presentation here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Cr3xac8Nm8M

Coinvest aims to consolidate cryptocurrency trading and the associated fees in a single platform, integrated with a wallet for its proprietary token COIN and eventually a full-fledged exchange.  Coinvest’s wallet is unique in that it has a built-in investment trading market. Author: ogrudko
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: Coinvest is still in negotiation with exchanges considering their part in this process.  Quote from: target on October 19, 2018, 12:41:33 PM Is there the need to swap again, mine is in the MEW only. But its good that you found out about that security issue now than it will be in the next years when price is already up. I may have misunderstood it but it says "THE TOKEN UPGRADE CAN ONLY OCCUR USING THE COINVEST WALLET". Does it mean I will have to install the coinvest wallet to upgrade my coins?  Coinvest is online wallet pretty much like MEW, but it will allow you to upgrade your COIN tokens automatically, without unnecessary frictions. You can use private key of your current wallet address where you store your COINs or transfer them to another address, which you will use to upgrade tokens.

Author: Coinve.st
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: Hi - Please use this information to add old COIN as custom token. MyEtherWallet: Go to the “Send Ether & Tokens” page Unlock and access your wallet using one of the given options Click on the “Add Custom Token” button on the right sidebar Enter the COIN address 0x4306ce4A5D8B21ee158CB8396A4F6866f14d6ac8 into the “Token Contract Address” field Enter “COIN1” into the “Token Symbol” field Enter “18” into the “Decimals” field Just click “Save” and you’re good to go!

Author: ogrudko
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: No, token swap has no expiration date, therefore you can swap your tokens. MEW set swapped V2 tokens as default one. So if you want to see your old tokens in MEW, please, add it as a custom token, using next parameters:  Token Contract:0x4306ce4A5D8B21ee158CB8396A4F6866f14d6ac8 Name: COIN1 (it's importand to add "1" at the end, other way MEW shows you error "token is already in your wallet") Decimals: 18

Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: Coinvest — Investment Platform Review - New platforms, like Coinvest, are combining the best of traditional exchanges and investments funds  Coinvest (https://coinve.st) aims to create a decentralized investment platform that combines the best of investment funds and traditional exchanges. Coinvest does not directly accept funds from the user, and instead uses its COIN token. It uses a smart contract and an autonomous trading bot to execute the necessary actions for the positions you enter, and credit users with profit from positions they have taken. Read further: https://hackernoon.com/coinvest-the-investing-platform-that-does-it-all-11e168dbacf

Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: On Coinvest platform you're not dealing with original cryptoassets like Bitcoin but with their value. It means that smart contract know that you're holding bitcoins according to the amount you invested in it. This allows you to hold any coin or token in your wallet skipping any difficulties and inconvenience related to using different blockchains for specific assets.

Author: ogrudko
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: Coinvest platform is decentralized trading platform where you can invest in different cryptoassets, all trades are being made with smart contract. It allow you to hold in one wallet investments into coins and tokens on different blockchains, and you don't need anyone to make trading pair, cause you interact directly with investment contract. All investments here are being made with COINs only.  Coinvest plus is more traditional exchange with an advanced order book matching system that pairs trades together, catering to sophisticated traders or institutional investors who require additional tools and features to perform analysis and execute trades at higher frequency

As crypto goes mainstream, Coinvest wants to make it easier for a wider audience to participate in this emerging sector of finance.

Author: Coinve.st
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: Thanks for your feedback, Edy.  Out of curiosity, what's the traction for those companies?  We believe that execution trumps ideas.  We can't speak regarding the other companies, but we have accomplished the following to-date:  -  MVP prototype and audited smart contracts (Hosho) including full documentation -  Upgraded protocol and audited smart contracts (Authio) to V2 to support innovation in new ERC standards -  Demo of V2 upgrade of the above 👆 -  Over 38+ blog articles, 7+ videos, and other collateral since the middle of November -  Registered offerings with the US SEC -  Registered as a money services business with the US FinCEN -  Relationship with the Maltese government and are working together on an unannounced effort -  Partnerships with reputable companies and organizations such as Republic, Quantstamp, and Ethereum Enterprise Alliance -  Exchange launch partnerships with IDEX and HitBTC as our first listings -  Hardware partnerships in place with Cardinal Peak and Cryptotronix to develop our hardware wallet -  Released COIN balance explorer -  Released CoinDNA (https://dna.coinve.st), Data, News, and Analytics website to help investors alongside their investment journey  We expect to release two products on MainNet in the next quarter as well.  We are curious about the other companies you mention and their traction to-date.

Author: Coinve.st
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: Circulation was determined according to the token allocation stated in our whitepaper.  4%:  Private Whitelist Reserve (Including Bonus) 45%:  Crowdsale Reserve (Including Bonus) 25%:  COIN Reserve (Held in Smart Contract) 10%:  Ecosystem Development and Partnerships 16%:  Employee and Advisor Option Pool to Recruit and Retain  All unsold tokens will be transfered to COIN reserve, Employee and Advisor Pool will be vested for 5 year with annual partial release. Ecosystem Development pool is yet to be used. All this leads us to current tokens in circulation - 8.7M of 107M issued. Tokens in COIN reserve and those which will be sent to COIN reserve (unsold ICO tokens) will be managed by smart contract. Noone including Coinvest can withdraw them from smart contrac. These tokens may go in circulation only as trading profit while using our platform see details in (whitepaper).

Body: To provide equal opportunity and distributed access, we are excited to announce a final public offering in partnership with Republic. This offering realizes our goal of enabling access to COIN across a full spectrum of audiences, geographies, currencies, and leaves no potential investors unaccounted for. The Republic and Coinvest partnership is a fully compliant CF offering that is registered with the United States Securities and Exchange Commission and includes all investors including US non-accredited. For more details on how you can participate, please visit:  https://goo.gl/t4gsWU

Author: Coinve.st
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: We are launching with no mobile support for Android and iOS.  However, our platforms will be fully responsive and support mobile devices so that the experience will be the same.  Additionally, if we decided to launch versions for the web, iOS, and Android concurrently, it would increase complexity, time, costs, etc.  For example, for every web developer... we would need one iOS and Android developer.  For every feature, we would have to implement that each platform.  Etc...  At present, speed to market is a larger priority.  Our strategy is to launch our web platform that is fully responsive and supports mobile devices first.  From there, ensure that the platform and network are working as expected.  Then develop iOS and Android mobile apps once the feature set and platform are solid.

Author: Idun
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: The team has published two new videos. The videos show how the platform works    Coinvest MVP Demonstration    Coinvest Etherless Transfer Demo  In this video, our CTO - Byron Levels walks us through a demonstration of the Coinvest Etherless Transfer Alpha (COIN V2 upgrade with ERC865). The ERC865 standard enables the payment of transfers in tokens instead of gas; therefore, eliminating the need to possess Ether and another token to execute single transactions. Thus helping Coinvest realize our vision of investing in hundreds of cryptonized assets using only one COIN.

Author: lonesomestranger
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: COIN Tokens bought during Token Sale were distributed immediately after receiving payment through the Coinvest Smart Contract! However, Coinvest Team decided to upgrade COIN Token to COIN V2, which requires a fork of the existing COIN token. COIN V2 is an upgrade to the existing COIN protocol and smart contracts. These changes include an upgrade with standard ERC865 while downgrading the token from ERC223 to ERC20 ! New tokens will be distributed to token sale participants and bounty participants after the fork, which will happen next month, in MAY 2018! For more info about the fork and next steps check out: https://medium.com/@CoinvestHQ/coinvest-token-sale-results-and-next-steps-5b8aaacdcfe6 https://medium.com/@CoinvestHQ/coin-protocol-and-smart-contracts-v2-0-d69a44eea538

Author: ogrudko
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: Binance is like many other exchanges on the market.  While exchanges are Coinvest closest competition, no one is executing investment trades in a completely decentralized process as Coinvest does... so it doesn’t have anyone to compare with directly... yet.  Coinvest is a trading platform (and market maker) where you make investment transactions and redeem profit from your trades through a process that is completely decentralized and handled by smart contracts.  Platform is an all-in-one investment platform, wallet, and exchange (future).  Coinvest aims to be a one-stop solution that enables anyone to easily buy, invest in hundreds of different cryptonized assets, and spend cryptocurrencies using only one wallet and one coin.  Coinvest main advantage is that it is decentralized. Investment process is managed by smart contracts including user investment data and funds. User funds are held in escrow (and not by a centralized third-party) by the smart contract until they are withdrawn by the user. Coinvest has no ability to touch or manage those funds including the liquidity pool that collateralize and back the investments. Once funds are withdrawn from a user’s portfolio, they can be stored in the wallet or spent directly from your wallet using the built-in debit account.  To make this more real, let’s apply this to a potential real-life scenario. Imagine if you want to invest in 12 different coins. With today’s solutions, you would have to:  -  Search and find all of the exchanges that support the coins you want -  Go through KYC checks for each exchange -  Place 12 individual trades and incur % fees for each trade -  Worry about having multiple wallets to support multiple protocols -  Manage different private keys -  Sell and convert your assets back to fiat currency before being about to spend them  On Coinvest, you could execute all of the above in one trade, for one fee ($4.99), and only have to manage one wallet. From there, you can spend your COIN directly from your wallet without having to convert it back to fiat (using our built-in debit card support).  Today, current solutions in the market are just too complicated. Coinvest is democratizing cryptocurrencies by creating a single destination that empowers anyone to easily buy, invest, and spend cryptocurrencies through a decentralized process using only a single online account and COIN.

Author: Coinve.st
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: Introducing the Coinvest Hardware Wallet:  https://wallet.coinve.st     Coinvest Announces Premium Hardware Wallet with Innovative Design and Architecture to Securely Store Cryptonized Assets The Coinvest hardware wallet complements the Coinvest decentralized investment trading platform and offers a single integrated solution to securely invest and store cryptonized assets.  DALLAS, TX - Coinvest, an emerging blockchain startup comprised of Microsoft alumni, is announcing the details of their hardware wallet that offers consumers a secure end-to-end solution to complement the Coinvest decentralized investment trading market for cryptocurrencies.  The Coinvest hardware wallet offers state-of-the art design and architecture featuring: -  A cryptographic coprocessor with secure hardware-based key storage and asymmetric and symmetric cipher support -  Linux operating system using a SAMA5D2 pre-PCI certified processor -  4.3” LED backlit full touchscreen display with 480x272 resolution -  FIDO/U2F support to use COIN wallet as a security token for two-factor authentication -  A single USB-C connection with support for authenticating desktop and mobile devices -  A dedicated screen and authentication chip to protect consumers even if the host computer is infected with a virus or malware -  Support for Bitcoin, Bitcoin Cash, Ethereum, ERC20 tokens, and more  Unlike current solutions on the market that leverage pure MCU-based solutions such as the Ledger and Trezor, Coinvest has chosen a pre-PCI certified processor to mitigate the security risks that competing platforms possess, while maximizing graphics capabilities for an experience that is second to-none. The wallet also has a single USB-C connection with support for authenticating desktop and mobile devices. With premium materials and a size equivalent to a credit card, the Coinvest wallet provides consumers an all-in-one portable personal security solution in a strikingly beautiful design.  The Coinvest hardware wallet integrates with the Coinvest investment trading platform to offer an end-to-end solution to securely invest and store cryptonized assets. In addition to the storage of popular cryptocurrency protocols such as Bitcoin and Ethereum ERC20 tokens, the wallet will have an integrated password management application and FIDO/U2F support to use the wallet as a security token for two-factor authentication. The Coinvest wallet development API will empower developers to build secure apps to use with the wallet as well as offer compatibility with other leading wallet solutions such as MyEtherWallet, MyCrypto, and more.  Alongside the hardware wallet, Coinvest will be offering a case for device protection. The hardware wallet case features three slots to hold credit cards with one slot as an option for the modular money clip. Two fitted magnetic slots secure the hardware wallet and travel cable in place. The case features a variety of premium textures and colors to fit all personal styles. The combination of the Coinvest hardware wallet and case offers a single solution to carry cash, credit cards, and cryptocurrency together in a package slightly larger than the size of a credit card.  Coinvest is partnering with leading hardware and security firms, Cardinal Peak and Cryptotronix, to bring the wallet to market by early 2019. The Coinvest wallet will retail for $249 and only be available for purchase using the Coinvest COIN token direct from the Coinvest website. COIN is currently available for purchase during Coinvest’s token sale through Friday, April 6th at 9:30 CST. For more information, visit https://wallet.coinve.st.  About Coinvest Coinvest is a blockchain technology company focused on developing solutions to democratize cryptocurrencies and bring them to the masses. The company’s mission is to create decentralized tools for the world to seamlessly and securely invest and use cryptocurrencies. Coinvest is lead by a team of Microsoft alumni and prominent advisors Tony Scott, former CIO of the US Government, VMWare, and Microsoft as well as Pete Cashmore, founder of Mashable. Coinvest is one of the only blockchain companies in the world registered with the United States SEC and FinCEN. For more information about Coinvest, please visit:  https://coinve.st.

Author: Coinve.st
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: As a heads up, we will be publishing details tomorrow regarding COIN V2 - an upgrade to our COIN protocol and smart contracts.  These changes include an upgrade with standard ERC865 and ERC 191 while downgrading our token from ERC223 to ERC20.  (Unfortunately, being on the bleeding edge of technology has not favored us as some exchanges have yet to upgrade from the ERC20 standard and can not support COIN)  COIN V2 includes improvements with security, privacy, performance, and efficiency.  For example,  anonymous investing with only your wallet address as your identity, direct transfers that leverage COIN instead of ETH for transfers using gas, and more. In addition to these improvements, COIN would have full compatibility and support with current exchanges on the market today.  These upgrades require a fork of our existing COIN token.  As a business, we have decided that a fork is most beneficial now as opposed to the future for the following reasons: -  Seamless distribution using a smart contract with no user interaction.  New COIN V2 would automatically be sent to the wallet addresses of those that invested (rending current COIN with no value).  Forking in the future would require a token swap and token holders to be manually involved in the swap . -  The improved changes reduce complexity and increase the time to bring the platform to market  This means that current COIN would have no value and new COIN would be distributed in a month after a token audit and distribution via a new smart contract.  Please note that this decision was made in favor of improving our technology for the benefit of users and overall business.  We are extremely excited about these upgrades as they provide for a better end-user experience.  We strongly believe that this short-term impact has favorable long-term implications that will help with Coinvest adoption and growth.   Full documentation including a demo of the COIN V2 transfer functionality will be published tomorrow.

Author: Coinve.st
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: Hi we11man!  Many exchanges (including decentralized exchanges) relies on other parties (exchanges / users) or API's to operate its network to assist with key functions such as order book matching, finding trading pairs, collateralization.  As a result, this impacts speed, introduces security risks, requires another counterparty, and results in a chicken before the egg problem before the network becomes valuable. (A company can claim their platform is decentralized which may be true... but if you require API, plugins, nodes, or other third-parties to execute a function on your platform, you've introduced centralization into your decentralized process.)  At Coinvest, we don't have the chicken before the egg problem as we are decentralized in our technology AND the dependency of others to operate.  As mentioned previously, Coinvest is a trading platform that empowers investors to make virtual investment transactions (like derivatives) and redeem profit from your trades through a process that is completely decentralized and handled by smart contracts.  We aim to be a one-stop solution that enables anyone to easily invest in hundreds of different cryptonized assets and spend cryptocurrencies using only one wallet and one coin.  Here are a few other differences from exchanges: -  Decentralization (our smart contracts control the network - See our article published today about Coinbase halting trades here:  https://goo.gl/54YNWX) -  Flexible investment trading options (limit orders, shorting, etc.) -  Convenience (Users no longer have to worry about dealing with multiple protocols, transferring assets, managing multiple wallets and private keys) -  Coin support (Many exchanges only supports a small number of coins):  At Coinvest, we plan to support 50-150 in 2018 alone.  We can do this and onboard coins very easy as we are virtualizing trades. -  Simplicity (Through Coinvest, you never have to worry about more than one wallet or one coin) -  Debit Card Account Support:  Instead of having to convert your coins back to fiat on current exchanges, you can spend directly from your Coinvest account through our Debit card. -  Future expansion to include virtual trading options such as ETF's, Alt Coin Futures, etc.  Here's an image that helps explain our advantages:

Body: Hi Luluvic -  In terms of coin support, our public beta will have support for the top 10 coins including BTC, ETH, BCH, XRP, etc.  Upon launch, we will work with the community and add coins per demand.  Our goal is to list anywhere from 50 - 150 coins in 2018.  Our strategy is to offer a mix of quality and quantity.  We want to support all of the high performing assets but also be flexible enough to accommodate user interest for a large number of other coins on the market as well.  Thanks.

Author: Coinve.st
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: Thanks for the support and interest.  Our min cap is $1M and we’be raised nearly a total of $5M. According to our analytics and our industry data, our results have been impacted by the two corrections in February and the latest market correction in March. We saw a decline in registrations since these events. We also see other peers in the industry holding token sales being impacted as well. We've written an article on this based upon our analysis:  https://medium.com/@CoinvestHQ/coinvest-token-sale-waterfall-analysis-f1553135c22c  We will continue to execute to increase our overall raise; however, please note a $5–10M raise is still enough runway to support our overall mission and roadmap. (Please keep in mind that in the VC world of Silicon Valley, a $5–10M raise is typically a Series A round)  A full raise of $30M would have allocated $15M into our reserves, allow the company to take business risks, and deploy a number of initiatives to broaden the Coinvest brand. A raise of only $5–10M increases our reserve size to $20–25M (as unsold tokens are moved to the reserves) and still accomplishes our goals; however, puts us in an environment in which we are focused on a core set of products, take little risks, and ensure full diligence in our operating expenses.  Please note that unsold tokens will be moved to the reserve to collateralize the network.  The smart contract will manage them and they will only be distributed if a user has profited them in a trade.  That means they will not be in the available in market circulation (such as exchanges) until a user makes profit on trades.  In our current environment, we still feel very confident with our roadmap, team, and ability to execute our mission. We ask for your support in continuing to believe in Coinvest for the same reasons that sparked your interest in our company from the beginning. We are fully committed in this journey together and won’t let you down.

Body: Quote from: lonesomestranger on March 11, 2018, 02:08:26 PM Quote from: sysco32 on March 11, 2018, 01:50:04 PM Quote from: wixord on March 11, 2018, 10:25:35 AM Quote from: LuckyBtc on March 10, 2018, 06:44:21 PM Where did the collection progress bar go? I think you should put back on collected progress bar or at least let us know If we can still participate.  https://etherscan.io/address/0xb743aed805aad342672131e575a2d6871511898a#tokentxns   you can track their contribution address through etherscan  still lots of COIN available to purchase.  This is very low - they have to push their ICO advertising to the max.Still a lot of time until the ICO would finish,but the amount bought so far is not even half of the private presale. Probably the low price of the ETH is not helping either.Is the price of the ETH pegged now or calculated on the fly?  The price of Ethereum is locked at $700 . But I don't really get it why the amount raised by now is so low, considering that when ICO begun on 9th, all their servers were down due to high demand! I finally managed to buy after 3 hours from the time ICO went live and honestly, I thought it would end in less than 48 hours!  Quote from: sysco32 on March 11, 2018, 01:50:04 PM Quote from: wixord on March 11, 2018, 10:25:35 AM Quote from: LuckyBtc on March 10, 2018, 06:44:21 PM Where did the collection progress bar go? I think you should put back on collected progress bar or at least let us know If we can still participate.  https://etherscan.io/address/0xb743aed805aad342672131e575a2d6871511898a#tokentxns   you can track their contribution address through etherscan  still lots of COIN available to purchase.  This is very low - they have to push their ICO advertising to the max.Still a lot of time until the ICO would finish, but the amount bought so far is not even half of the private presale. Probably the low price of the ETH is not helping either.Is the price of the ETH pegged now or calculated on the fly?  Hi everyone.  You are correct.  This is very low and has surprised our team as well.  We've been reviewing our analytics and will be publishing an update on this soon.  According to our analytics and our industry data, our results have been impacted by a number of things:  -  Overall Market:  The two corrections in February and the latest marketer correct in March. We saw a decline in registrations since these events. We also see other peers in the industry holding token sales being impacted by the latest market corrections as well. -  Scam Attempts:  The morning of our token sale, hackers and scammers flooded our servers and communications channels with DDOS attacks (traffic) that overloaded our servers which crippled our ability to proceed with our site loading, email sign-ups, email verification, etc.   They also created imposter accounts and channels and directly reached out to our investors and misguided them with false wallet addresses.  Investors that experience FOMO and did not take our instructions over the past month were impacted. -  Lack of Marketing:  Given the strong demand velocity in the registrations we received, we scaled back or delayed specific marketing activities and announcements.  We have now discovered that the recent market weaknesses eliminated a lot of that original interest.  Therefore, we will be kicking up our marketing efforts and resuming planned marketing activities.  We hope to turn things around; however, if we only raise $5 - 10M, it will still be enough runway to support our overall mission and roadmap.  (Please keep in mind that in the VC and world of Silicon Valley, a $5 - 10M raise is typically a Seed A round)  A full raise of $30M would have allowed us to take business risks and deploy a number of initiatives that could help broaden the Coinvest brand.  A raise of $5 - 10M still accomplishes our goals; however, puts us in an environment in which we are focused on one path, take no risks, and ensure full diligence in our operating expenses.  We still feel very confident with our roadmap, team, and ability to execute our mission with this raise.  We ask for your support in continuing to believe in Coinvest for the same reasons that sparked your interest in our company from the beginning.

Body: Congrats on developing this innovative concept, I am interested. Two questions:  Are you planning that investments are 100% backed by reserve pools, or do you expect to start with a smaller reserve pool as some of the ICO proceeds will also go to fund the platform? In the event there is a discount/premium between client investments and the reserve pool, how will the community be able to look up this information in real-time? Author: Coinve.st
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: Hi phonglouis!  We've consulted with our legal counsel at Olshan Frome Wolosky in NYC and are following the same legal guidance, requirements, and actions that other companies such as Overstock, Filecoin, Blockstack, and Props here in the US have completed as well. All have also required US investors to be accredited and provide the appropriate documentation for verification. We're sorry for any inconvenience that this requirement by the SEC has imposed for US investors. Without compliance, everyone involved is exposed to high risk (such as has been experienced by many other projects in the space today).  Quite frankly, we don't support the SEC's requirements on this as it doesn't provide equal opportunity and helps the rich get richer. This is one of the reasons why our mission is to create decentralized tools to help remove third-parties and bring power back to the people.  Please note that the accreditation requirement is solely for US investors as deemed by the US SEC. These restrictions do not apply to non-US investors.

Author: Easternbloc
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: It is a really impressive team that has been put together but reading the whitepaper there is literally one paragraph dedicated to KYC which is basically "you don't need to do KYC". This throws up so many questions to a prospective investor so could you please answer these for me:  1. As a New York state resident how can i use coinvest without a) Coinvest holding a "Bitlicense" from the state and b) doing all that without KYC? 2. Why are you having to go through strident US verification processes for a service that won't even need KYC for customers?  KYC, especially for decentralised funds are imperative to get right and Coinvest's approach to this is imperative to the success of this investment. Maybe i'm missing something so could the coinvest representative please expand on this?  Thanks

Author: Coinve.st
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: It's official! While COIN has utility in our platform by leveraging smart contracts for trade execution and writing investment data to the blockchain, we are excited to announce that our Coinvest COIN token is filed as an official security token. Learn more here:  https://goo.gl/LVY4ga

Author: Coinve.st
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: Hi Easternbloc!  1.  Unfortunately, given the strict requirements around New York law, (like many other exchanges) we would not be able to offer NY residents the ability to use our platform until we obtain our BitLicense.  2.  We've consulted with our legal counsel at Olshan Frome Wolosky in NYC and are following the same legal guidance, requirements, and actions that other companies such as Overstock, Filecoin, Blockstack, and Props here in the US have completed as well. All have also required US investors to be accredited and provide the appropriate documentation for verification.  We're sorry for any inconvenience that this requirement by the SEC has imposed for US investors. Without compliance, everyone involved is exposed to high risk (such as has been experienced by many other projects in the space today).  Quite frankly, we don't support the SEC's requirements on this as it doesn't provide equal opportunity and helps the rich get richer. This is one of the reasons why our mission is to create decentralized tools to help remove third-parties and bring power back to the people.  Please note that the accreditation requirement is solely for US investors as deemed by the US SEC. These restrictions do not apply to non-US investors.  As for KYC, in 2018 we will introduce our trading market and investment trading platform to trade hundreds of cryptocurrencies using COIN. You will have to acquire COIN through our crowdsale or an exchange such as Bittrex to do so.  Even before we officially become an exchange, users will be able to obtain value and make profit through investment trades using COIN.  KYC is not required in this scenario.  In 2019 (or earlier), we become a licensed exchange (by obtaining our money transmitter license) and you will be able to buy COIN direct from our website using Fiat currency. In that way, we become a one stop shop for buying, investing and spending cryptocurrencies using only one COIN.  This convenience for our users is the primary reason for becoming an exchange.  In order to buy COIN directly from us, KYC would be required as we are accepting fiat.

Body: Hi A56-7W -  We've intentionally locked the ability to download our whitepaper as we want to be to sole source of data / information regarding our business.  We didn't want to create confusion by having multiple versions of our whitepaper floating around the internet, potential fraud, copying, etc.

Author: Coinve.st
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: Hi YulyNov.  We are very active in BitcoinTalk, Telegram, and all social media channels as you can see in our posts and responses to our community.  As every standard token sale, we will continue our token sale period as long as there are tokens still available for purchase.  Once our max cap of $30M is reached, the sale will end, and the smart contract will close and all amounts contributed above that will be returned.  We are definitely not a SCAM.  We welcome you to view our blog, YouTube videos, and business registrations that display our legitimacy.  We have no interest in attempting to mislead anyone and will always operate within the legal boundaries of any jurisdiction.  If we were a scam, there would be no interest in filing with the US SEC and working directly with regulators on compliance for investor protection.  Additionally, the interest of credible and reputable advisors attaching their name to Coinvest.  The livelihood of our community, our employees, and our reputations are far more important than any amount of money. 🙂

Author: A56-7W
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: Hi.  This seems to me like a bit of a mealy-mouthed distraction where none is needed here for basic transparency. It's just a white paper. For better or worse, I'm now thinking, "if there is nothing to hide, why act as if you're trying to hide something".  I'd like to think that potential investors that actually read white papers are intelligent enough not to be bamboozled by "multiple versions" of any document. I don't know what it's like now, but in the olden days, some people liked to put dates and version numbers in their documents so others could tell new from old. Alternatively, I like to do this thing called "asking the company directly for information".  I'd be interested to know more about the "potential fraud" angle since I've never before seen that in relation to any ICO white papers. On the "copying" front, some potential investors like to do plagiarism checks on white papers, which means they are out of luck with yours being so locked down. Although I'm sure there are "workarounds" out there for the determined.

Author: Coinve.st
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: Thanks for the feedback A56-7W.  Our response was really nothing more but to help explain that we want to minimize confusion as much as possible.  For example, when we originally created our whitepaper, our token economics were pegged to ETH.  In December, we updated this so that COIN was pegged to the USD in communicated here:  https://medium.com/@CoinvestHQ/coinvest-token-value-3083c010503f  Have one point of distribution for our whitepaper allowed us to update this information in one location... all within our control.  We found that many articles and reviews written about Coinvest prior to this change reflected older token economics which could potentially create confusion.  (These articles and reviews are still out on the Internet and have yet to be updated by those authors)  To prevent a situation like this, we determined it was appropriate to lock down the permissions of the whitepaper.  Especially in the event where we may need to make adjustments.  To the other points, we've seen examples where companies like Tron have fraudulently copied verbiage from other companies.  Again, we want to remove this risk from any other company whether they are competition or not.  Lastly, while there are savvy investors out there that can decipher between multiple versions of a document, we would rather not make that assumption for all of the investors across the board.  With that goal of providing accuracy and minimizing confusion, we believe that this is the best approach.  We hope that you understand our position on this rather than infer that we are attempting to hide something.

Author: blockchain-man
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: Hello can you explain what the coin reserve 25% and 50% secondary reserve is? what is the token issue date ? What is the exact mechanism for the team token lockup? When* is the token issue date?

Author: ogrudko
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: Hi! This will be the long one.    Quote can you explain what the coin reserve 25% and 50% secondary reserve is?  COIN reserve is held inside of the smart contract.  25% of token supply is immediately deposited into this reserve for instant liquidity to the network.  Losses from user trades are also deposited in the COIN reserve.  The COIN reserve can accept deposited funds but does not support withdrawals from any third-party including Coinvest.  It is located inside of, and managed solely by, the smart contract. The secondary reserve backs up the COIN reserve to provide contingency.  50% of the funds raised from tokensale go into the second reserve.  Assume Coinvest hits full raise of $33M, that would mean $16.5M goes into the secondary reserve.  Suppose Coinvest doesn't hit full raise, any unsold tokens go into the COIN reserve.  The secondary reserve contains cryptonized assets that mirror 1:1 or outpace cryptocurrencies being traded on platform.  Coinvest is hiring asset managers in order to manage risk/reserve, help reduce risk, and grow the business. However, based upon forecasts, the network should never have to utilize the secondary reserve.  Even, in the event of worst case scenario, where every trader has profited and decides to liquidate at the same time.  If that were to happen, and the amount happens to exceed the first reserve, then the second reserve would be deployed.  Even in that case, the second reserve would have had the same, or similar, holdings to those in the user portfolios...ensuring that the system is still liquid and Coinvest could replenish the first reserve again.  Quote what is the token issue date ?  Tokensale will last from March, 9th to April, 6th. Tokens will be sent to respective wallets immediately after contribution by smart contract.  Quote What is the exact mechanism for the team token lockup?  Coinvest treats tokens options for its employees and advisors similar to stock options. They carry a 5 year vesting schedule with annual distributions for every award.

Body: Thanks for your support renault18turbo!  This is correct.  Following the token sale, stake data will be calculated and distributed in accordance to the following schedule:  First quarter after end of token sale - 25% Second quarter after end of token sale - 25% Third quarter after end of token sale - 25% Fourth quarter after end of token sale - 25%  This payout system has been devised to help protect the value of COIN by preventing mass selling once COIN is listed on exchanges.  This also ensures bounty participants have ample opportunity to observe the execution and performance of the company during the first year.

Author: Coinve.st
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: Hi nguyen linh!  It's the latter.  However, Coinvest collateralizes the investment using our reserves so you no longer have to worry about storing or transferring the assets themselves.  Similar to the stock market, when you purchase Apple stock you do not receive the physical stock certificate... however, the value is retained in contract.  Coinvest employs two reserves.  Our COIN reserve is held inside of the smart contract.  25% of our token supply is immediately deposited into this reserve for instant liquidity to the network.  Losses from user trades are also deposited in the COIN reserve.  The COIN reserve can accept deposited funds but does not support withdrawals from any third-party including Coinvest.  It is located inside of and managed solely by the smart contract.  The secondary reserve backs up the COIN reserve to provide contingency.  50% of the funds raised from our tokensale goes into the second reserve.  The secondary reserve contains the actual cryptonized assets that mirror 1:1 or outpace cryptocurrencies being traded on our platform.  We will purchase assets through our relationships with exchanges and brokers and store the assets securely in cold hardware wallets.  In our public quarterly earnings report, we will list the wallet addresses and amounts of our reserves for complete transparency.

Author: Coinve.st
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: Hi dsmsnv!  In 2018 we will introduce our trading market and investment trading platform to trade hundreds of cryptocurrencies using COIN. You will have to acquire COIN through our crowdsale or an exchange such as Bittrex to do so.  In 2019 (or earlier), we become a licensed exchange (by obtaining our money transmitter license) and you will be able to buy COIN direct from our website. In that way, we become a one stop shop for buying, investing and spending cryptocurrencies using only one COIN.

Author: Coinve.st
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: Hi Leodalat!  Thank you for your interest and support in Coinvest.  Please note that there is not a whitelist for the main crowdsale and KYC will be performed during the purchase process.  Additionally, that we can not make any guarantees for a seat in our February crowdsale (as it is controlled by our smart contract on a first come / first serve basis).  Registering on our form enables us to keep you informed and notify you in advance so that you are best positioned to participate in the crowdsale.

Author: Coinve.st
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: Hi Lauren!  The bounty campaign will continue through the end of our crowdsale in February.  I also believe that this helps explain the distribution and lockup periods:  Private Whitelist (Ended):  Tokens purchased from our private whitelist will be distributed before the February crowdsale.   February Mainsale (Upcoming):  Tokens purchased during the main crowdsale will be distributed automatically / immediately via our smart contract via our crowdsale smart contract. The distribution of tokens will take place almost instantly, again dependent upon connection speed, congestion of the network.  Bounty Campaign Participants:  Tokens distributions will occur on a quarterly basis up to 1 year.  Employees and Advisors:  We treat tokens for our employees and advisors similar to stock options.  They carry a 5 year vesting schedule with annual distributions for every award.

Author: Aresha
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: Explain, please, what does bounty company members mean to be paid quarterly within 1 year? That is, some participants (for example, company signatures) will be able to receive their reward only in a year? It sounds a bit strange ...

Author: Coinve.st
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: Hi Aresha.  As mentioned in the instructions and notes of our bounty details.  Following the crowdsale, stake data will be distributed in accordance to the following schedule:  First quarter after end of crowdsale - 25% Second quarter after end of crowdsale - 25% Third quarter after end of crowdsale - 25% Fourth quarter after end of crowdsale - 25%  This payout system has been devised to help protect the value of COIN by preventing mass selling once COIN is listed on exchanges.  This also ensures bounty participants have ample opportunity to observe the execution and performance of the company during the first year.

Author: Coinve.st
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊

We employed a lottery process for this round given the demand we experienced (1500 registered and 3.3x our max cap of $3M) -  To enable access and distribution to as many contributors as possible, we have enabled the following in the smart contract:     - Whale Protection at 50ETH max contribution     - Gas protection at 50 GWEI max contribution  Thanks!

Unfortunately, we can not confirm or speculate what exchanges COIN will be listed upon due to legal NDA's. We have developed our MVP token and smart contracts which are available on GitHub at:  https://github.com/CoinvestHQ/COIN Our Ropsten test network Investment contract address is: 0x2e6d78558b6287f0f3fadc4814550f55234aac2f. You can view a sample of our UI here:  https://goo.gl/cG12oX  Thanks!

Author: Coinve.st
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: Our development continues to progress and we feel that we can launch a public version of our platform in March of 2018.  However, given the security and importance of our reserves, we would like to perform three security audits (one with the community and two security firms) prior to launch to ensure the security and reliability of our code.  Depending on the speed of these audits and any fixes associated with this, it could impact the release date.  In the meantime, our full Beta is planned to be launched before our crowdsale. We have developed our MVP token and smart contracts which are available on GitHub at:  https://github.com/CoinvestHQ/COIN Our Ropsten test network Investment contract address is: 0x2e6d78558b6287f0f3fadc4814550f55234aac2f.   You are free to test all functions by interacting directly with our smart contract.  We expect to complete our end-to-end BETA before the crowdsale which includes our web front-end so that users can test the product through our user-friendly interface instead of having to use an ABI / JSON interface.  You can view a sample of our UI here:  https://goo.gl/cG12oX.  For marketing, you will continue seeing components of our marketing strategy executed this week.  Our marketing strategy will continue beyond our crowdsale.  We've decided to hold off on some of our larger announcements and activities beyond our crowdsale date given our current demand.

Author: Tonisim
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: Coinvest Welcomes New Corporate Talent  As Coinvest continues to rapidly grow, we’re excited to announce and welcome new team members to the Coinvest family. Coming from diverse backgrounds and multiple disciplines, these talented individuals bring their passion and expertise to the company, helping to grow and realize our vision.  Mike Pretti, Full Stack Software Developer  ike Pretti has been programming and developing for over 20 years. His began in the field learning how to peek and poke a Commodore Vic 20. This eventually led to a Bachelor of Mathematics while studying at the University of Waterloo. It was at that point he launched his professional career as a Software Developer working for companies such as IBM, Credit 1, QuoteMedia, and most recently Shopify. Always fascinated with patterns, numbers and games naturally caused him to explore how to play in the equity markets. Mike owned and operated a proprietary trading firm that used a mix of fully automated and hybrid algorithmic trading systems to take advantage of opportunities upon the introduction of decimalization, dark pools and ECNs into the equity markets.  He is now excited to help create a decentralized exchange, making it easier for the masses to take advantage of the cryptocurrency market. Keeping him equally busy and happy are his two children, spending time at the cottage, preferably with a good non-fiction and a dusty scotch.  Rachel Novosad, Communications Manager  Rachel Novosad is a PR and marketing professional joining Coinvest to drive the creation and execution of its overall communications strategy. Originally hailing from the east coast, Rachel studied Public Relations and Psychology at Penn State University. Rachel’s expertise comes from her experience across various fast-paced industries — working for technology and entertainment companies such as Hulu, Adobe and Discovery Communications, numerous up-and-coming startups and brands, and owning her own PR firm, Rebel Coast Media. Rachel is excited to join the rapidly evolving Coinvest team, bringing her passion for developing brands and connecting companies to their audience through creative marketing campaigns, media relations, social media growth, compelling content, events and more.  Apart from her professional interests, Rachel loves to travel and spends her winters trading the beaches of sunny southern California for chasing powder in the mountains.  Varija Yelagalawadi, Operations Manager  Varija Yelagalawadi is a project and operations manager joining Coinvest with experience across various industries. Her deep love for process was first piqued in university, where she pursued a degree in Public Relations. She discovered a penchant for operations in the early days of her career and continued to expand her interests by taking on roles in account management and community relations. These led her to a role at Adobe, working as a community manager within the IT organization. Over the course of four years, Varija worked in varying capacities across Adobe — most recently in a project management position on an experience strategy team. This role launched her excitement for crafting a seamless, agile experience for customers and employees. She brings this excitement to Coinvest and is thrilled to join and support the team.  When she steps away from work, Varija finds herself in San Diego, taking in lots of sunshine and hunting down the perfect pastry shop.  https://medium.com/@CoinvestHQ/coinvest-welcomes-new-corporate-talent-24fe1ae49422

Author: Kazi0xiii
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: Correct me if i'm misunderstanding the concept, but if i want to purchase, i.e., $200.00 of BTC, $200.00 of ETH and $100.00 of TRX on Coinvest's platform, i'll, in effect, be purchasing $500.00 COIN value which, on Coinvest, will grow/decrease in value per current market values of the above-stated pro rata shares in BTC, ETH, and TRX...not actually holding any coins except for COIN, correct?  If confirmed, then am I able to move my $500.00 COIN value to Ledger Nano Wallet?  If so, if i moved it to Nano and, one month later moved all COIN back to Coinvest, would it remember the pro rata shares i purchased in virtual BTC, ETH and TRX?

Author: Coinve.st
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: Hi Kazi0xiii!  Actually, when you make a trade on our platform, your COIN value is held in the underlying assets in your investment portfolio.  However, that investment data and the contract value is held in our smart contract, platform, and blockchain.  In your example, you would use $500 in COIN to trade and make your investment portfolio.  That value and your positions are held in the smart contract.  Once you are ready to sell, the smart contract returns the investment value back to your wallet using the equivalent value in COIN.  (For example, if your investment portfolio increased to $1000, you would receive $1000 in equivalent value in COIN depending on the market price)    When COIN sits on your Coinvest wallet or another wallet, it is not in an investment portfolio and would be treated as a normal currency for you to use or spend.  (If it is on your Coinvest wallet, then you can easily spend your COIN using the Coinvest debit card)  Does this help?

Author: Coinve.st
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: Hi ohliuw!  Bisq is a P2P exchange where you can exchange crypto-to-crypto or crypto-to-fiat with another trading pair.  While Bisq is a nice platform, we would comment that they are still very different from our business.  While decentralized, Bisq require a trading pair in order to operate it's network to execute it's key exchange function.  If a trading pair is not found or matched, the trade doesn't occur.  As a result, this impacts speed, requires another counterparty, and results in a chicken before the egg problem before the network becomes valuable.   At Conivest, we are a investment trading platform that executes trades through virtualization (like derivatives).  We are a full decentalized platform that relies solely on smart contracts to execute all of the necessary functions to execute our mission. Since we are virtualizing trades, Coinvest doesn't rely on any trading pair dependancies as Bisq does.  Therefore, orders are executed immediately by the smart contract once conditions are hit.  That reason alone, should provide for an experience that is much more efficient than what the market offers today.  A few other differences from Bisq: -  Decentralization: Coinvest’ order execution, fund management, and distributions are managed and executed by smart contracts (so there is no third-party involvement) - Speed: Order execution is instant on Coinvest vs. waiting for trading pair matching - Security:  Our smart contract is the custodian of your investment funds. - Convenience:  Invest in multiple cryptonized assets without having to worry about storage, multiple wallets, multiple private keys, and transferring / supporting all coin protocols. Through Coinvest, you never have to worry about more than one wallet or one coin. - Functionality:  Coinvest enables flexible trading options to help you obtain the best value with buy, buy limit, short orders - Cost:  Since Coinvest is automated and controlled by smart contracts, third-parties and overhead are removed which leads to lower cost transactions fees - Diversification:  Coinvest enables you to curate your own custom personal index fund (In the future, we will allow users to invest into other user's personal index funds.) - Support:  (Coinbase only supports 3 coins, other exchanges support X number):  At Coinvest, we plan to support 50-250 in 2018 alone.  We can do this and onboard coins very easy as we are virtualizing trades like derivatives. -  Liquidity:  Instead of having to convert your coins back to fiat on current exchanges, you can spend directly from your Coinvest account through our Debit card. -  Innovaton:  Future expansion to include virtual trading options such as ETF's, Alt Coin Futures, Commodities such as Oil, Corn, etc. -  Experience and Credibility: Our team has decades of corporate experience ranging from companies such as Microsoft, IBM, etc. Our advisors are leaders and have played significant roles in their respective industries.  For a complete and detailed comparison, we recommend you view pages 7 and 8 of our whitepaper at: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1ePI50Vd9MGdkPnH0KdVuhTOOSiqmnE7WteGDtG10GuE/edit?usp=sharing

Body: Hi jeniferlavender!  As more participants join the ecosystem, the community rapidly increases in size through network effects. As the overall ecosystem grows, transaction volumes increase requiring the need for COIN token purchases to fund smart contract execution. As transaction volume increases, trade revenue increases which support buybacks of COIN to replenish the COIN reserve. In turn, the value of the COIN token will appreciate organically through demand. But most importantly, community transactions increase and become perpetual.

Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: Hi doge_shit666 -  Coinvest is the easiest way to invest and spend cryptocurrencies. With the Coinvest platform and protocol, investors are empowered to create virtual investment portfolios to invest in multiple cryptocurrencies through only one COIN. Similar to derivatives, users trade the value of the underlying asset without requiring the need to hold the assets themselves. Meanwhile, investment portfolios are fully collateralized by Coinvest reserves. Users are no longer required to manage multiple exchanges, wallets, private keys, and can spend COIN directly from their Coinvest wallet using our built-in debit card support.  We are democratizing cryptocurrencies by creating a single destination that empowers anyone to easily invest and spend cryptocurrencies using a decentralized process through only one COIN.  Consider us the e-trade of cryptocurrencies with debit card account support.  We want to make it so easy that even grandma can participate in this revolution!

Body: Quote from: Candice on January 08, 2018, 03:13:49 PM Quote from: tricass on January 02, 2018, 10:42:41 PM Quote from: tricass on January 02, 2018, 02:12:33 PM just discovered this project and read the whitepaper but it's not clear to me whether the index fund I create actually holds the underlying asset (ie you have some exchange integration that buys the underlying asset/coin) or is this more a derivative (where the index fund simply tracks the underlying price of each asset/coin based on some price feed)?  got an answer on their telegram. it's basically a derivative you are creating. say when you create an index fund where you, for eg, have a 25% allocation into btc, eth, ltc, xrp you actually dont own any of the underlying coins when you send COIN to their SC. There is nothing in the backend that actually connects to an exchange, buys and holds those coins. They'll effectively get some price feed from somewhere that will provide pricing for you index fund that can be used to value your portfolio and importantly how much profit or loss you make when you liquidate. You get back the difference in value in COIN. Think CFDs (contracts for difference)  thanks for you explain  ,now it's clear to me .i will follow this project .  Thank you!  We hope to earn your trust and future business Candice and shikra76!

Author: tricass
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: got an answer on their telegram. it's basically a derivative you are creating. say when you create an index fund where you, for eg, have a 25% allocation into btc, eth, ltc, xrp you actually dont own any of the underlying coins when you send COIN to their SC. There is nothing in the backend that actually connects to an exchange, buys and holds those coins. They'll effectively get some price feed from somewhere that will provide pricing for you index fund that can be used to value your portfolio and importantly how much profit or loss you make when you liquidate. You get back the difference in value in COIN. Think CFDs (contracts for difference)

Author: Coinve.st
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: Quote from: benhnghenghiep on January 02, 2018, 02:58:15 PM Interesting, your project looks like a fund of cryptocurrencies more than stock market for this one. I still confused after reading the whitepaper.  Quote from: tricass on January 02, 2018, 02:12:33 PM just discovered this project and read the whitepaper but it's not clear to me whether the index fund I create actually holds the underlying asset (ie you have some exchange integration that buys the underlying asset/coin) or is this more a derivative (where the index fund simply tracks the underlying price of each asset/coin based on some price feed)?  tricass is right on this.     Coinvest is a trading platform (and market maker) where you make virtual investment transactions (like derivatives trading on the stock market) and redeem profit from your trades through a process that is completely decentralized and handled by smart contracts.  Our platform is an all-in-one investment platform, wallet, and exchange (future).  We aim to be a one-stop solution that enables anyone to easily buy, invest in hundreds of different cryptonized assets, and spend cryptocurrencies using only one wallet and one coin.  To make this more real, let’s apply this to a potential real-life scenario. Imagine if you want to invest in 12 different coins. With today’s solutions, you would have to: -  Search and find all of the exchanges that support the coins you want -  Go through KYC checks for each exchange -  Place 12 individual trades and incur % fees for each trade -  Worry about having multiple wallets to support multiple protocols -  Manage different private keys -  Sell and convert your assets back to fiat currency before being about to spend them  On Coinvest, you could execute all of the above in one trade, for one fee ($4.99), and only have to manage one wallet. From there, you can spend your COIN directly from your wallet without having to convert it back to fiat (using our built-in debit card support).  Today's solutions in the market are just too complicated. Coinvest is democratizing cryptocurrencies by bringing it to the masses.  We want to make this so easy that even Grandma can use it and participate in this new revolution.  🙂

Author: Coinve.st
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: Hi cryptodan21 -  Exchanges are the closest competition at this time.  But quite frankly, no one is executing investment trades in a completely decentralized process as we are... and exchanges do not have a mechanism to spend directly from your account... So we don’t have anyone to compare with directly... yet.  First, Coinvest is a trading platform (and market maker) where you make investment transactions and redeem profit from your trades through a process that is completely decentralized and handled by smart contracts.  We aim to be a one-stop solution that enables anyone to easily buy, invest in hundreds of different cryptonized assets, and spend cryptocurrencies using only one wallet and one coin.  Our difference and main advantage is that we are decentralized.  Our investment process is managed by smart contracts including user investment data and funds. User funds are held in escrow (and not by a centralized third-party) by the smart contract until they are withdrawn by the user.  No third-party (including Coinvest) has the ability to touch or manage those funds including the liquidity pool that collateralize and back the investments. Once funds are withdrawn from a user’s portfolio, they can be stored in the wallet or spent using the built-in debit account.  Additionally the following: - Security:  Our smart contract is the custodian of your investment funds. - Convenience:  Invest in multiple cryptonized assets without having to worry about storage, multiple wallets, multiple private keys, and transferring / supporting all coin protocols. Through Coinvest, you never have to worry about more than one wallet or one coin. - Functionality:  Coinvest enables flexible trading options to help you obtain the best value with buy, buy limit, short orders - Cost:  Since Coinvest is automated and controlled by smart contracts, third-parties and overhead are removed which leads to lower cost transactions fees - Diversification:  Coinvest enables you to curate your own custom personal index fund (In the future, we will allow users to invest into other user's personal index funds.) - Support:  (Coinbase only supports 3 coins, other exchanges support X number):  At Coinvest, we plan to support 50-250 in 2018 alone.  We can do this and onboard coins very easy as we are virtualizing trades like derivatives. -  Liquidity:  Instead of having to convert your coins back to fiat on current exchanges, you can spend directly from your Coinvest account through our Debit card. -  Innovaton:  Future expansion to include virtual trading options such as ETF's, Alt Coin Futures, Commodities such as Oil, Corn, etc.  For a complete and detailed comparison, we recommend you view pages 7 and 8 of our whitepaper at: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1ePI50Vd9MGdkPnH0KdVuhTOOSiqmnE7WteGDtG10GuE/edit?usp=sharing

Author: Coinve.st
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: Hi!  As you find in our whitepaper, we have two reserves.  The first reserve is our COIN reserve and houses all of the COIN that will be distributed as profit for the network.  The Second reserve will be actual cryptonized assets mapped to what users are trading on the platform.  The business has been architected to never even deploy the use of the second reserve.  Only unless in the event of worst case scenario.  Suppose every trader has profited and decides to liquidate at the same time.  If that amount happens to exceed the first reserve, then would the second reserve be deployed.  Even in that case, the second reserve would have had the same or similar holdings to those in the user portfolios that the system is still liquid and we could replenish the first reserve again.  Here are six reasons why we forecast we would never even hit "worst case scenario": 1)  Please also note that COIN losses from unprofitable trades go to the COIN reserve 2)  We will implement trading pairs and match buy / sell orders (Which derisks the platform because orders then wash each other) 3)  Trading markets usually have probability (odds) that are around 50%.  So that naturally creates a balanced profit / loss market to always ensure that the reserve is liquid. 4)  We will have a secondary reserve in place to backup the COIN reserve that can mirror or outpace trades on the platform 5)  We will have trading limits to protect the network in the case of large swing orders 6)  Our profit model enables us to buyback and replenish the COIN reserve as needed  Unlike many other startups that use a large percentage of raised funds for who knows what... 25% of our total token supply (15M COINS) is immediately put in the COIN reserve in the smart contract.  ADDITIONALLY, 50% of the funds being raised are used for the reserves as well.  Assume we hit our full raise of $33M, that would be 16.5M.  Suppose we don't hit our full raise, any unsold tokens go into the COIN reserve.  With our buybacks (that also go into the reserve) and investor trading losses going into the reserves.  On day one of opening our doors, that's quite of bit of liquidity.  We will also scale the platform alongside its growth.  As previously mentioned, we will deploy user and trading limits to ensure the network is operating correctly before opening it to the world or putting any liquidity pools at risk.

Author: Coinve.st
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: Hi Topotam!  Exchanges are the closest competition at this time.  But quite frankly, no one is executing investment trades in a completely decentralized process as we are... and exchanges do not have a mechanism to spend directly from your account... So we don’t have anyone to compare with directly... yet.  Coinvest is a trading platform (and market maker) where you make investment transactions and redeem profit from your trades through a process that is completely decentralized and handled by smart contracts.  Our difference and main advantage is that we are decentralized. Our investment process is managed by smart contracts including user investment data and funds. User funds are held in escrow (and not by a centralized third-party) by the smart contract until they are withdrawn by the user. Coinvest has no ability to touch or manage those funds including the liquidity pool that collateralize and back the investments. Once funds are withdrawn from a user’s portfolio, they can be stored in the wallet or spent using the built-in debit account.  Additionally the following: - Simplicity and Speed: No KYC requirements and validation as investments are virtual and we don't deal with Fiat currency - Convenience: Invest in multiple cryptonized assets without having to worry about storage, multiple wallets, multiple private keys, and transferring / supporting all coin protocols - Functionality: Coinvest enables flexible trading options to help you obtain the best value with buy, buy limit, short orders - Cost: Since Coinvest is automated and controlled by smart contracts, third-parties and overhead are removed which leads to lower cost transactions fees - Diversification: Coinvest enables you to curate your own personal index fund (In the future, we will allow users to invest into other user's personal index funds.)  For a complete and detailed comparison, we recommend you view pages 7 and 8 of our whitepaper at: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1ePI50Vd9MGdkPnH0KdVuhTOOSiqmnE7WteGDtG10GuE/edit?usp=sharing  If there are specific companies that you would like us to compare to, please let us know.

Author: Coinve.st
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: Hi pakupayung!  The bounty will run through our crowdsale in February.  As noted in our bounty thread, full bounty payments (token distribution) will be issued no more than two weeks after the end of crowdsale. Bounty will be divided among the participants proportionally to the amount of their stakes. Users must have an ETH ERC20 compatible wallet address to be eligible and accept COIN tokens.  Receiving Rewards: The total bounty pool is 300.000 COIN tokens to be distributed. If the Coinvest crowdsale does not reach the minimum goal of 1M USD (3.333 ETH) raised, all COIN tokens are automatically burned by a smart contract and the bounty will be considered void.  Following the crowdsale, stake data will be calculated and distributed in accordance to the following schedule:  First quarter after end of crowdsale - 25% Second quarter after end of crowdsale - 25% Third quarter after end of crowdsale - 25% Fourth quarter after end of crowdsale - 25%  This payout system has been devised to help protect the value of COIN by preventing mass selling once COIN is listed on exchanges.  This also ensures bounty participants have ample opportunity to observe the execution and performance of the company during the first year.  If you have any questions or concerns, please contact support@coinve.st.

Author: Coinve.st
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: We decided to push back our presale offering one month because of the following reasons: -  To give us additional time for marketing -  To accomodate for the upcoming holiday schedule in December -  To enable the community more time to beta test our MVP once released -  Since publicly announcing three weeks ago, we've received strong interest and partnership opportunities that will require additional time to execute and market (which we expect to help boost -  the overall demand for our offerings) -  We wanted to align our offering with 2018  Pushing back the date should also assure the community that we are not interested in trying to scam, pump and dump, or hurt the community for our benefit.  Unlike many other companies out there, most attempt to raise money as soon as possible with bad intentions.  On the other hand, we are attempting to make strategic decisions that will ultimately help the longevity of our business and our community.

Author: Coinve.st
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: Coinvest Executive Update — 12/4  To our Coinvest community,  In support of the blockchain industry and spirit of complete transparency, we wanted to take the opportunity to provide you with an update. This Summer, we began our journey to execute the following mission:  “Creating decentralized tools for the world to seamlessly, securely, and safely invest and use cryptocurrencies.”  Since then, we built a team of experienced industry professionals to lead to the development of the COIN protocol and Coinvest smart contracts. Meanwhile, ensured legal compliance for all aspects of our company. Lastly, developed and executed our marketing and operation strategies to maximize our potential for both short and long-term success. As a result, we confidently released our website, whitepaper, protocol source code, and crowdsale in November.  Since publicly announcing three weeks ago, we have received a warm welcome from the community. This includes, but is not limited to, publicity, strong community development, partnership inquiries, and favorable demand in our private whitelist offering. As a data driven company, I’d like to share a few metrics from our community driven traction to-date:  900+ members on our Telegram channel 500+ Messages and 29,000+ Views on our BitcoinTalk ANN Thread 196 Facebook bounty campaign participants 216 Twitter bounty campaign participants 66 articles written by community members about Coinvest Over 100+ private whitelist registrations Favorable crowdsale ratings from sites such as ICOBench and TrackICO  These results are indicative of the hard work our team is incurring to support our mission. Additionally, aligns with the strong interest that we have received in our private whitelist offering. (Thus, leading us to believe that we will have no tokens available for the planned public pre-sale in January based upon current demand velocity). While positive, we recognize that this is merely just the beginning of our journey. We still have plenty of work ahead of us to execute and earn the world’s trust to participate in the industry.  Over the next month, you can expect the following from our team:  MVP release of the Coinvest APP (as an example of the frontend solutions developers can build to leverage the COIN protocol) Code audits of the COIN token and smart contracts by professional auditing firms Additional partnership announcements Begin recruitment engine to acquire additional engineering talent Increased community activity and involvement  We are still on target with our roadmap schedule and public launch in Q1 2018. As we move forward, we commit to continue providing updates on our progress. On behalf of our team, we’d like to thank you for your support thus far. For those that believe in our team, execution, and mission, we ask you to continue helping us spread the word. For those that would like to learn more about Coinvest and our team, please feel free to reach out to our team at hi@coinve.st and we’ll be more than happy to assist. We hope to earn your trust, support, and business in the future.  Much respect, D. Nam and the Coinvest team   This article is also located on our blog at:  https://goo.gl/ht3LEw
