Author: Coinve.st
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: Our COIN is simply called... COIN.  You can find our more information about our COIN here:  https://medium.com/@CoinvestHQ/coin-token-27f00d1691b8  In summary, COIN enables us to write investment data to the blockchain, preserve user trading history, and leverage smart contracts to handle the management and distribution of funds.  All automated with computer code and without any third-party or human involvement.   We are inspired by companies such as Apple that look to maintain simplicity in everything they do.  We operate in a similar fashion from our design, branding, messaging, and more importantly, our mission.  We want to make cryptocurrencies simple.

Author: Coinve.st
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: Quote from: Marco Ambrusini on November 26, 2017, 08:56:51 PM They have a solid roadmap.If everything goes as planned i believe the project will be a great success.i hope dev make their platform user friendly for everyone to understand the stock market of cryptocurrencies on the website  Thanks starcryoto1983 and Marco!  We sincerely appreciate your feedback and support.

Author: Coinve.st
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: Hello Mattia92.  Coinvest earns a $4.99 flat rate trading revenue fee for each trade.  While it may seem low, please note the potential of growth based upon transaction volume and every buy / sell order.  For example, E-trade has trading revenues of over $400M annually.  While we don't expect to be e-trade anytime soon, we believe that we can slowly scale the Coinvest businesses to significant revenue as the popularity of cryptocurrency increases.  Additionally, we plan to introduce other methods for additional revenue streams including margin accounts, etc.

Author: Coinve.st
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: If anyone is interested in meeting our team directly, our founder will be in New York the first week of December and the team will be in Dallas the remainder of December.  In January, a few members of the team will be in LA, Seattle, Las Vegas (for CES), NYC, and DC for business and partner meetings.  We are also planning to attend the following conferences: -  Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Blockchain Super Conference (Dallas):  2/16 - 2/18 -  Blockchain & Cryptocurrency Con 2018 (Dallas):  2/22 - 2/24 -  DC Blockchain Summit (Washington DC): 3/6 - 3/8  If you’re in the same area, feel free to schedule some time with us to connect.    Meanwhile, look forward to some livestream Q&A's from our team every month starting December.

Author: Coinve.st
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: Hi Everyone!  We decided to push back our presale offering one month because of the following reasons: To give us additional time for marketing To accomodate for the upcoming holiday schedule in December Since publicly announcing two weeks ago, we've received strong interest and partnership opportunities that will require additional time to execute and market (which we expect to help boost the overall demand for our offerings) We wanted to align our offering with 2018  Pushing back the date should also assure the community that we are not interested in trying to scam, pump and dump, or hurt the community for our benefit.  Unlike many other companies out there, most attempt to raise money as soon as possible with bad intentions.  On the other hand, we are attempting to make strategic decisions that will ultimately help the longevity of our business and our community.

Author: Coinve.st
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: Thank you for your support Ann!  Quote from: carnitastaco on November 25, 2017, 05:54:58 PM Quote from: Coinve.st on November 23, 2017, 05:30:29 PM Quote from: appraiser on November 23, 2017, 09:44:18 AM When does Coinvest plan to launch its exchange to support liquidity?  Hi Appraiser!  To ensure liquidity and collateral for the Coinvest ecosystem, we implement two reserves.  One is called the COIN reserve which is held and managed inside of the smart contract.  This reserve collects COINS from losses and distributes COINS for profits.  We've also created a secondary reserve to back up the COIN reserve for contigency and redundancy purposes.  In order to launch an exchange in the US, we'll have to acquire a license and ensure that we comply with all legal regulation.  Since our focus is on the platform, we want to spend 2018 ensuring that it is operating as expecting and then launch the exchange in 2019.    This is a very good idea! It is a pity that this will have to wait so long, but I understand that in order to do everything competently and qualitatively, it will take a lot of time and effort  Thanks carnitastaco!  Our smart contracts are available for test on GitHub and TestNet right now.  Our full MVP with the graphical user interface will be out in December for public beta.  We expect a full public release for Q1 of 2018.

Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: I`ve lost your answer in pages  of flood =) Sorry  But what is your difrence withCOSS, BQX and many other multifunctional crypto wallets?

Author: Coinve.st
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: We will break your question down into two parts: -  How do we position ourselves against our competition? -  How do we compare against COSS -  How do we compare against Bitquence (Ethos)  Our closest competition at this stage of the market are exchanges.   First, Coinvest is a trading platform (and market maker) where you make investment transactions and redeem profit from your trades through a process that is completely decentralized and handled by smart contracts.  Our difference and main advantage is that we are decentralized. Our investment process is managed by smart contracts including user investment data and funds. User funds are held in escrow (and not by a centralized third-party) by the smart contract until they are withdrawn by the user. Coinvest has no ability to touch or manage those funds including the liquidity pool that collateralize and back the investments. Once funds are withdrawn from a user’s portfolio, they can be stored in the wallet or spent using the built-in debit account.  Additionally the following: - Simplicity and Speed: No KYC requirements and validation as investments are virtual and we don't deal with Fiat currency - Convenience: Invest in multiple cryptonized assets without having to worry about storage, multiple wallets, multiple private keys, and transferring / supporting all coin protocols - Functionality: Coinvest enables flexible trading options to help you obtain the best value with buy, buy limit, short orders - Cost: Since Coinvest is automated and controlled by smart contracts, third-parties and overhead are removed which leads to lower cost transactions fees - Diversification: Coinvest enables you to curate your own personal index fund (In the future, we will allow users to invest into other user's personal index funds.)  For a complete and detailed comparison, we recommend you view pages 7 and 8 of our whitepaper at: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1ePI50Vd9MGdkPnH0KdVuhTOOSiqmnE7WteGDtG10GuE/edit?usp=sharing   COSS As for COSS, they claim to be a one-stop shop for everything related to cryptocurrencies (with focus on businesses and developers).  This includes the ability to exchange, create smart contracts, act a payment gateway, enable commerce solutions, etc.  This is grand vision to operate in every aspect of cryptocurrencies under the COSS token ecosystem.  This is great, but variably different from Coinvest as we are solely focused on enabling users to buy, invest, and use cryptocurrencies.  Our platform doesn't assist with smart contract creation, merchant tools, etc.  While we aim to be a one-stop shop for cryptocurrencies, we are focused on users and retail investors.  Therefore our largest differences between Coinvest and COSS are: -  Audience and Mission:  They are focused on developers and businesses while we are focused on consumers and retail investors -  Decentralization:  Our order execution, fund management, and distributions are managed and executed by smart contracts (so there is no third-party involvement) -  Growth Potential:  In order for COSS to reach it's full potential, they have to create partnerships and engage in deals with developers and businesses to gain traction.  The sales cycles for this is much longer and more difficult.  For Coinvest to succeed, the company needs to acquire users which has less of a sales cycle, lower customer acquisition costs, and can gain traction through virality, referrals, etc. -  Experience and Credibility:  We have years of corporate experience with our team and advisors ranging from companies such as Microsoft, IBM, etc.    Ethos (Bitquence) Ethos is leveraging an API to settle trades with exchanges and acts as an intemediary (third-party) for handling your trades.  This is not prefered as now you have have to manage a portfolio with Ethos and trust Ethos and an exchange for a simple trade order.  Ethos has also not provided any technical specifications in their whitepaper as we have so we assume that they are still architecting their solution.  Therefore our largest differences between Coinvest and Ethos are: -  Decentralization:  Our order execution, fund management, and distributions are managed and executed by smart contracts (so there is no third-party involvement) -  Speed:  Order execution is instant on Coinvest vs. having to wait for settlement on an exchange through Ethos API's -  Experience and Credibility:  We have years of corporate experience with our team and advisors ranging from companies such as Microsoft, IBM, etc.  -  Transparency and Execution:  We've already documented our architecture and created our smart contracts (available for testing on GitHub) in just a few months time.  Ethos has not done any of this.  Execution > Ideas and slick marketing videos  To build on the execution argument, our full MVP will be released in the coming weeks. So we’ll be ahead of any players that are looking to get into this space.  Hopefully this helps clarify differences. If it doesn’t and you still have questions, please let us now.

Author: Coinve.st
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: Hi Appraiser!  To ensure liquidity and collateral for the Coinvest ecosystem, we implement two reserves.  One is called the COIN reserve which is held and managed inside of the smart contract.  This reserve collects COINS from losses and distributes COINS for profits.  We've also created a secondary reserve to back up the COIN reserve for contigency and redundancy purposes.  In order to launch an exchange in the US, we'll have to acquire a license and ensure that we comply with all legal regulation.  Since our focus is on the platform, we want to spend 2018 ensuring that it is operating as expecting and then launch the exchange in 2019.

Author: Coinve.st
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: We have a $4.99 flat rate commission for all trades.  Unlike exchanges that charge anywhere from .25% to 4.5% per transaction.  Trading commissions are our largest revenue stream.  We'll have other revenue streams in the future including margin interest, debit card transactions, and exchange fees.  This is great from an investment standpoint, because we have committed to the following: -  50% of company net profit will be leveraged to replenish the COIN reserve in the smart contract and for buybacks of COIN in order to ensure price stability and token asset holder value.

Author: Coinve.st
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: This would be in Q4 of 2018.  The reason being is that the amount raised in our crowdsale impacts our strategy.  Pending that we have a full raise of our max cap, that allows us to build the internal capacity of team members to help us complete this in-house.  A partial raise will limit our ability to have resources to develop this within the company.  In turn, we would have to partner with a provider such as TenX or Monaco.

Author: Coinve.st
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: That's right!  Unlike other platforms that are just trading tools, we offer a complete trading market with full liquid reserves for profit distribution.  It's like a stock market for cryptocurrencies.  Consider us the E-Trade of cryptocurrencies.

Body: Hello Morgan.  Coinvest earns a $4.99 flat rate trading revenue fee for each trade.  While it may seem low, please note the potential of growth based upon transaction volume and every buy / sell order.  For example, E-trade has trading revenues of over $400M annually.  While we don't expect to be e-trade anytime soon, we believe that we can slowly scale the Coinvest businesses to significant revenue as the popularity of cryptocurrency increases.  Additionally, we plan to introduce other methods for additional revenue streams including margin accounts, etc.

Body: Thanks for your feedback BeenieMan.  We were inspired to create Coinvest as a vehicle that enables anyone to easily take advantage of investing and using cryptocurrencies with ease.  We seek to eliminate the complexity involved with the current options available on the market today.  With this being said, Coinvest is an an end-to-end solution for users where you can buy, invest, AND spend cryptocurrencies... all in one easy-to-use platform / wallet and requiring only one COIN.  Meanwhile the process is completely decentralized with no third-party involvement.

Author: Coinve.st
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: Quote from: dedmaroz on November 21, 2017, 02:49:32 PM Quote from: morgan4140 on November 21, 2017, 02:29:43 PM I asked this question earlier but got no answer. What are your advantages over other of exchanges? will you have to pay a percentage of the transaction?  Most importantly, they have a very low percentage of the cost of translations. Also they have interesting bonus programs.  Hi Seidr, demaroz, and morgan4140!  Please note that we are not an exchange.  Coinvest is a trading platform (and market maker) where you make investment transactions and redeem profit from your trades through a process that is completely decentralized and handled by smart contracts.  Our difference and main advantage is that we are decentralized. Our investment process is managed by smart contracts including user investment data and funds. User funds are held in escrow (and not by a centralized third-party) by the smart contract until they are withdrawn by the user. Coinvest has no ability to touch or manage those funds including the liquidity pool that collateralize and back the investments. Once funds are withdrawn from a user’s portfolio, they can be stored in the wallet or spent using the built-in debit account.  Additionally the following: - Simplicity and Speed: No KYC requirements and validation as investments are virtual and we don't deal with Fiat currency - Convenience: Invest in multiple cryptonized assets without having to worry about storage, multiple wallets, multiple private keys, and transferring / supporting all coin protocols - Functionality: Coinvest enables flexible trading options to help you obtain the best value with buy, buy limit, short orders - Cost: Since Coinvest is automated and controlled by smart contracts, third-parties and overhead are removed which leads to lower cost transactions fees - Diversification: Coinvest enables you to curate your own personal index fund (In the future, we will allow users to invest into other user's personal index funds.)  For a complete and detailed comparison, we recommend you view pages 7 and 8 of our whitepaper at: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1ePI50Vd9MGdkPnH0KdVuhTOOSiqmnE7WteGDtG10GuE/edit?usp=sharing  Thanks!

Author: Coinve.st
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: Hello everyone.  Coinvest earns a $4.99 flat rate trading revenue fee for each trade.  While it may seem low, please note the potential of growth based upon transaction volume and every buy / sell order.  For example, E-trade has trading revenues of over $400M annually.  While we don't expect to be e-trade anytime soon, we believe that we can slowly scale the Coinvest businesses to significant revenue as the popularity of cryptocurrency increases.  Additionally, we plan to introduce other methods for additional revenue streams including margin accounts, etc.  Please note that our overhead is significantly lower than traditional companies in this space as many responsibilities are handled by autonomous computer code and smart contracts.  Advancement in technology is replacing jobs that were once handled by people and we are one example of that.

Author: Coinve.st
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: Hi Rocketron -  We are always open to any ideas that the community suggests including yours.     That's one of the reasons why we are electing to ensure our code is open-source.  So that we can continue to get feedback from our community to improve and make this the platform that the users want.  As our whitepaper states:  Coinvest is a company and community built for the people… by the people.     As for Coinvest, our specific smart contact functionality enables us to do a few things: -  Record investment data to the blockchain -  Hold and distribute user funds based upon certain conditions  Thus eliminating the need for a third-party broker (human) to document or ever touch funds since it is all autonomous and handled by computer code.  There are other examples that are using smart contracts to do eliminate the need for third parties brokers as well.   For example, betting platform (Dao Casino), prediction markets (Augur), etc.

Author: rocketron
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: Great!  I'm just trying to fantasize a bit on this subject, than Coinvest may be useful to me.  So, let's say I'm a portfolio investor. I determined, for example, ten coins, which are interesting to me and determined the specific weight of each of them in my investment portfolio. Conditionally I decided that each of the coins I should have 10% of the volume calculated in dollars. But we know how crazy volatility is in the market. Therefore, the specific weight of coins relative to the dollar will change daily. Each of the selected coins may become cheaper or vice versa may rise in price to the USD.  And how can I be if I'm not ready to track these currency races everyday? (If I'm ready it is, then I'm not a portfolio investor, but rather a trader at an exchange  .) Here smart contracts come to the rescue.  By means of smart contracts on your platform, you can specify an algorithm in which the specific weight to the dollar will be constantly reduced to the set parameters of 10 coins of 10% with respect to USD. So, such an algorithm will allow you to fix a profit in a currency that showed growth and reallocate the asset into currencies that look oversold.

Author: Coinve.st
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: Great suggestion although in that instance, we would become a market manipulator to help people secure profits.  Unfortuantely, we can not do that due to legal and liability issues.  We can't help people profit or take on the risk / liability if the algorithm incorrectly made purchases that made the user lose money.   What we can do and are doing is being a market maker and enabling people to invest / trade based upon their own decisions.  We hope this helps clarify things.

I've provided the links below. Author: Coinve.st
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: Hi Teal Deer and Wiak!  Yes, we plan to offer a debit account AND card for our users.  That integration would happen in late 2018 pending a successful crowdsale.  It doesn't make sense to invest in cryptocurrencies if you can't easily use them.  So our wallet and debit account solves this problem and enables users to spend their assets at any merchant that supports debit cards around the world.  We want to become the one-stop shop for everyone to be able to purchase, invest, trade AND spend cryptocurrencies all together in one solution (that is simple and secure).

Author: Coinve.st
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: Hi Lordmick and Sakiri -  Sakiri is right on in that we want to build a strong development community around our platform in order to ensure the security, safety, and stability of the platform.  In order to do that, a community of developers needs to be able to review the code and validate this.  We also support the openess and transparency of the blockchain industry.  Therefore, open-source is the best way to achieve this.   Our protocol and tools will always be open source so that developers can use and build on top of them.  By doing so, it also enables more companies to build on top of the Coinvest protocol and increase transaction volume which in turns enables Coinvest to use net profit to acquire more COIN tokens for the reserve (and increasing COIN value).

Author: Coinve.st
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: Great feedback Lordmick.  We would counter that a platform should be built by great technologies, mathmaticians, and data scientists (with advisory counsel from investment and trading professionals).  The Coinvest platform and all great technology is dependent on mathmatical operations and a strong code base.  Those are strengths of our team given our background and experience.  We have decades of software development experience with specialists in the field of data science and finance from companies such as Microsoft, IBM, Moneygram, and more.  We are also leveraging outside experts in the field of investment and trading for advisory as needed.  Once we are able to secure additional funding, one of our first hires will be from the investment banking field to assist with asset management.

Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: Hi Zhou!  Please note that we are not an exchange.  Coinvest is a trading platform (and market maker) where you make investment transactions and redeem profit from your trades through a process that is completely decentralized and handled by smart contracts.  Our difference and main advantage is that we are decentralized. Our investment process is managed by smart contracts including user investment data and funds. User funds are held in escrow (and not by a centralized third-party) by the smart contract until they are withdrawn by the user. Coinvest has no ability to touch or manage those funds including the liquidity pool that collateralize and back the investments. Once funds are withdrawn from a user’s portfolio, they can be stored in the wallet or spent using the built-in debit account.  Additionally the following: - Simplicity and Speed: No KYC requirements and validation as investments are virtual and we don't deal with Fiat currency - Convenience: Invest in multiple cryptonized assets without having to worry about storage, multiple wallets, multiple private keys, and transferring / supporting all coin protocols - Functionality: Coinvest enables flexible trading options to help you obtain the best value with buy, buy limit, short orders - Cost: Since Coinvest is automated and controlled by smart contracts, third-parties and overhead are removed which leads to lower cost transactions fees - Diversification: Coinvest enables you to curate your own personal index fund (In the future, we will allow users to invest into other user's personal index funds.)  For a complete and detailed comparison, we recommend you view pages 7 and 8 of our whitepaper at: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1ePI50Vd9MGdkPnH0KdVuhTOOSiqmnE7WteGDtG10GuE/edit?usp=sharing  Thanks!

Author: Coinve.st
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: Hi Rockertron - We don't believe in chatter.  We believe in results.     We responded with the below yesterday.  Please view:  https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2381017.msg24772974#msg24772974  Smart contracts are extremely valuble for the financial industry in our business.  For example, they can help us: -  Streamline and improve financing efficiencies for buyers, suppliers and institutions -  Streamline post-trade processes, removing duplicative processes executed by each counterparty for verifying trades and conducting appropriate trade events -  Provide accurate, transparent financial data recording to improvide data integrity  As a result provide reduced costs, faster / greater liquidity of financial assets and increased market stability.  Other industries are leveraging smart contracts to eliminate third-parties, reduce costs and increase efficiency as well.  Unfortunately there are few good examples in the blockchain space today as it is still early... We hope to break that mold.  Thanks!

Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: To ensure the safety and security of our users and overall platform, Coinvest will support coins and tokens that are validated and demanded by the community.  For our MVP, we are only supporting the ten most popular coins on the market (according to market cap).  One the public beta concludes and we ensure appropriate testing, we will add additional coin based upon communtiy feedback.  Our goal is to scale the platform in accordance to growth to ensure security, stability, scalability, reliability, etc.  Since we are dealing with user invested funds, we want to our smart contracts and platform to scale carefully with due diligence to prevent any errors or unexpected use cases.

Author: Coinve.st
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: Yes indeed!  In fact, that is one of our main advantages that also decentralizes the investment process. Our investment process is managed by smart contracts including user investment data and funds.  User funds are held in escrow by the smart contract until they are withdrawn by the user. Coinvest has no ability to touch or manage those funds including the liquidity pool that collateralize and back the investments. Once funds are withdrawn from a user’s portfolio, they can be stored in the wallet or spent using the built-in debit account.  For more technical details, please refer to the COINVEST PROTOCOL AND SMART CONTRACTS section on page 19 of our whitepaper: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1ePI50Vd9MGdkPnH0KdVuhTOOSiqmnE7WteGDtG10GuE/edit?usp=sharing  Thanks!

Author: Coinve.st
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: A common question we have received is, "is the COIN token available on exchanges"?  To answer, we haven't conducted our crowdsale yet so the the tokens have not been distributed and are not in anyone's possession.  This includes distribution to our team as well.  To ensure fairness, security, and prevent misuse, we use a smart contract for token distribution as well.  This is all in support of complete transparency and decentralization for our community and users.  Therefore our tokens are not available on the market or on any exchanges.  However, we are currently working on partnerships (in parallel with our development) that will enable our COIN token to be available on exchanges following our crowdsale.

Body: We are in the United States.  Tony Scott is indeed real.     His LinkedIn profile is here for reference:  https://www.linkedin.com/in/tony-scott-9ab2172a  Tony was previously the CIO for the US Government, VMWare, Microsoft, and Disney.  He was the CIO at Microsoft when a few of our worked there.  Hence the link.  He's also an advisor to Cobinhood whom recently raised approximately $14M in their crowdsale last month.  He's currently part of the Blockchain Research Institute and they have asked Coinvest to be a reference case study for the institute in the future.  As an advisor to the company, Tony advises in a number of different areas including security, scaling growth, and the crowdsale itself.  We are extremely excited to have him on board.

Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊

Author: Coinve.st
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: Hi Udonmez - We aren't a decentralized exchange (at least not until we execute our full vision).    We are a trading platform run and managed by smart contracts.  Consider us a decentralized E-Trade for cryptocurrencies.  Our difference and main advantage is that we are decentralized. Our investment process is managed by smart contracts including user investment data and funds.  User funds are held in escrow by the smart contract until they are withdrawn by the user. Coinvest has no ability to touch or manage those funds including the liquidity pool that collateralize and back the investments. Once funds are withdrawn from a user’s portfolio, they can be stored in the wallet or spent using the built-in debit account.  Additionally the following: -  Diversification:  Coinvest enables you to curate your own personal index fund (In the future, we will allow users to invest into other user's personal index funds.) -  Simplicity and Speed:  No KYC requirements and validation as we don't deal with Fiat currency -  Convenience:   Invest in multiple cryptonized assets without having to worry about storage, multiple wallets, multiple private keys, and transferring / supporting all coin protocols -  Functionality:  Coinvest enables flexible trading options to help you obtain the best value with buy, buy limit, short orders -  Cost:  Since Coinvest is automated and controlled by smart contracts, third-parties and overhead are removed which leads to lower cost transactions fees  For a complete and detailed comparison, we recommend you view pages 7 and 8 of our whitepaper at: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1ePI50Vd9MGdkPnH0KdVuhTOOSiqmnE7WteGDtG10GuE/edit?usp=sharing  Thanks!

Author: Streets 2.0
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: In your report on the passing of the test of Howey I pay attention to the Debevoise & Plimpton logo. Are they your legal advisers? or prepared an analysis of the securities law?

Author: Coinve.st
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: No.  Debevoise & Plimpton (along with Cooley)  are just contributors that created this framework for companies to test and determine if they are a security?  Out of complete transparency, (because these are our values), we have not secured an official formal relationship with a legal counsel yet.  We have had preliminary conversations with legal counsel and will look to formalize a relationship once our pre-sale concludes (since they are not cheap  ).  In preliminary discussions and based upon our parameters / results in this framework, we feel very strongly and confident that we are not considered a security.  We recommend viewing lines 9 - 18 of that document for specific reasons why.  Thanks!

Author: Coinve.st
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: Hi Bigcash!  Investors benefit from value appreciation in the COIN itself.  Unfortunately we are not a security and do not offer profit sharing, dividends, or returns for investors.  However, 50% of company net profit will be leveraged to replenish the COIN reserve in the smart contract and for buybacks of COIN in order to ensure price stability and token asset holder value.  As more participants join the ecosystem, the community rapidly increases in size through network effects. As the overall ecosystem grows, transaction volumes increase requiring the need for COIN token purchases to fund smart contract execution. In turn, the value of the COIN token will appreciate organically through demand. But most importantly, community transactions increase and become perpetual.

Author: Coinve.st
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: During the whitelist and presale, investors can contribute using BTC, BCH, and ETH.  During the crowdsale, only ETH as we have developed our smart contracts to automatically handle distribution of tokens and only accepts ETH in order to do that. Contributors will receive tokens immediately to their wallet upon purchase.

Anyone can interface with the smart contract directly to test the platform at:  https://github.com/CoinvestHQ/COIN  We are finalizing our webapp that will enable non-technical users to use the platform without having to interface directly with the protocol.  That will be completed by the end of this month.

Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: You get to decide and control the distributions % of your own personal index fund.    Suppose you want to buy 10 different COINS on an exchange, you would have to purchase each one individually and incur fees for each transaction, manage wallet storage for each different protocols, manage multiple, private keys, etc.  On Coinvest, you can complete this in one trade, only incur a $4.99 trading fee, and don't have to worry about the things above.  In the future, other users can invest into your own index fund (and you can essentially become a "hedge fund" manager).

Author: Coinve.st
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: Thansk Consigliere!  As previously noted, we vary greatly with our competition. More specifically, no other platform enables you to curate your own personal index fund. (In the future, we will allow users to invest into other user's personal index funds as well)  Our largest advantage is that we are decentralized. Our investment process is managed by smart contracts including user investment data and funds.  User funds are held in escrow by the smart contract until they are withdrawn by the user. Coinvest has no ability to touch or manage those funds including the liquidity pool that collateralize and back the investments. Once funds are withdrawn from a user’s portfolio, they can be stored in the wallet or spent using the built-in debit account.  For a complete and detailed comparison, we recommend you view pages 7 and 8 of our whitepaper at: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1ePI50Vd9MGdkPnH0KdVuhTOOSiqmnE7WteGDtG10GuE/edit?usp=sharing

Author: Coinve.st
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: Thanks for the feedback here Allan!  Our fee schedule is $4.99 upon any trade order within an investment portfolio. This is significantly lower and more predictable than the fees incurred with competing exchanges.  For example, popular exchanges charge anywhere from .25 - 3% on all transactions regardless of amount or volume.  As a result, a $5,000 order and 1% fee can result in an expense of $50.  Since eveything is autonomous and controlled by smart contracts, we have considerably less overhead than our competition and can offer significantly less fees to support the platform.  Company profits enable us to purchase additional COIN in order to help provide price stability in the market as well.  As for security, our source code will be open-sourced and available for the community to validate and review.  We are using the support of the community (with bug bounties) and will engage two professional security firms to audit our code to ensure the security of the platform.  From a technical perspective, we've partnered with Civic for authentication and will also offer 2FA as an option.  We'll also employ SSL across all public facing channels, etc.  We use AWS but also deploy firewalls to protect databases, etc.  There a more technical things we are doing, but these are just a few examples.

Author: uwatere
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: as I often see projects with investment models in cryptocurrency, then what are the advantages of this project compared to other projects?

Author: Coinve.st
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: Hi Uwatere -  Thank you for your question. So we vary greatly with our competition. More specifically, no other platform enables you to curate your own personal index fund. (In the future, we will allow users to invest into the personal index funds)  Our largest advantage is that we are decentralized. Our investment process is managed by smart contracts including user investment data and funds.  User funds are held in escrow by the smart contract until they are withdrawn by the user. Coinvest has no ability to touch or manage those funds including the liquidity pool that collateralize and back the investments. Once funds are withdrawn from a user’s portfolio, they can be stored in the wallet or spent using the built-in debit account.  For a complete and detailed comparison, we recommend you view pages 7 and 8 of our whitepaper at: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1ePI50Vd9MGdkPnH0KdVuhTOOSiqmnE7WteGDtG10GuE/edit?usp=sharing  Thanks!

Author: Coinve.st
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: WEBSITE  WHITEPAPER  TELEGRAM  DISCORD TWITTER  FACEBOOK  BLOG    Whitelist Opportunities Available Now      Coinvest is the world’s first decentralized stock market for cryptocurrencies. We are determined to democratize cryptocurrencies by creating tools to provide mechanisms for consumers to seamlessly, securely, and safely invest and use cryptocurrencies.   Coinvest is creating a future where users have one platform, one wallet, and one token (COIN), that enables anyone to create a digital investment portfolio to invest in multiple cryptocurrencies. Thereby reducing the cost, risk, and complexity associated with investing in cryptocurrencies on centralized exchanges or investment funds. Centralized third parties that are often needed in traditional investment use cases are replaced with smart contracts that act as autonomous agents and programmatically compensate all users, investors, and owners within the entire Coinvest ecosystem.  Please visit https://coinve.st for information regarding Coinvest and our upcoming crowdsale.  Today’s announcement represents the beginning of a much larger and broader vision.  We are excited to work with the community to create the default platform that will help users seamlessly invest and use cryptocurrencies.  We encourage you to join our Discord and view our website to learn more.   For security, please note:  Coinvest only has one official website (https://coinve.st).  All other websites representing Coinvest and our name should be considered fraudulent and disregarded.  Authorized Coinvest representatives will only be communicating from the following online accounts:  Email - coinve.st domain Reddit - CoinvestHQ Telegram - CoinvestHQ Discord - Coinvest Bitcointalk.org - CoinvestHQ Facebook - CoinvestHQ Twitter - CoinvestHQ Medium - CoinvestHQ  Coinvest Bounty Thread      Below is the experienced team of industry professionals and advisors at Coinvest:  Advisors:  Tony Scott:  Formerly the CIO of the US Government, VMWare, Microsoft, and Disney Pete Cashmore:  Founder and CEO of Mashable Kendrick Nguyen :  CEO of Republic  Team:  Damon Nam:  Founder and Executive Director Byron Levels:  Technology Director Taylor Rieckens:  Business Development Director Ramiro Galan:  Creative Director Umar Irshad:  User Experience and Interface Director Kevin Huynh:  Analytics and Operations Director Varija Yelagalawadi:   Operations Manager Dexaran Derat:  Blockchain Engineering Robert Forster:  Blockchain Engineering Mike Pretti:  Senior Full Stack Engineer Dmitriy Golovchenko:  Engineering

Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: Because using smartcontract it means only accepting the investment in the form of token ether and when investing here the withdrawal can be done at any time without in limitation by the duration of investment ?. instead of each stock investment itself has its own time period

Author: Coinve.st
Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: Hi Maronk -  Yes... Since we are leveraging smart contracts and our token is based upon the ERC20 ETH standard, that is technically correct.  However, our platform is limited to our COIN token for investment transactions and will require our COIN tokem to operate.  Withdrawals can be requested at any time and are executed by the smart contract.  There is never any involvement with our company or any third-party.  Investments including profit will be withdrawn in COIN tokens and sent back to your wallet.  Thus enabling faster trading and execution which helps frequent and day traders.

Title: 📌 [ANN] 📢 [ICO] 💰 COINVEST 📈 DECENTRALIZED STOCK MARKET FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES 📊
Body: Hi Krezz - Profits that users incur from profitable trades will be compensated in COIN tokens as well.  The smart contract will automatically distribute COIN from the COIN reserve back to your wallet.  Our wallet has integration with our partner, Changelly to exchange COIN into any other supported cryptocurrency such as BTC, BCH, and ETH.  Long term, we will integrate debit card support so that you can spend your COIN at any merchant that accepts a debit card.
